member.name: T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions
member.summary: Contains static methods for retrieving custom attributes.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttribute``1(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified assembly.
member.returns: A custom attribute that matches , or null if no such attribute is found.
member.param: The assembly to inspect.
member.typeparam: The type of attribute to search for.
member.exception: More than one of the requested attributes was found.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttribute(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified assembly.
member.returns: A custom attribute that matches , or null if no such attribute is found.
member.param: The assembly to inspect.
The type of attribute to search for.
member.exception: More than one of the requested attributes was found.

member.returns: A custom attribute that matches , or null if no such attribute is found.
member.param: The member to inspect.
member.typeparam: The type of attribute to search for.
member.exception: is not a constructor, method, property, event, type, or field.

A custom attribute type cannot be loaded.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified assembly.
member.returns: true if an attribute of the specified type is applied to ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The assembly to inspect.
The type of the attribute to search for.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified member.
member.returns: true if an attribute of the specified type is applied to ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The member to inspect.
The type of attribute to search for.
member.exception: is not a constructor, method, property, event, type, or field.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified member, and, optionally, applied to its ancestors.
member.returns: true if an attribute of the specified type is applied to ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The member to inspect.
The type of the attribute to search for.
true to inspect the ancestors of ; otherwise, false.
member.exception: is not a constructor, method, property, event, type, or field.

The type of attribute to search for.

member.name: T:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping
member.summary: Retrieves the mapping of an interface into the actual methods on a class that implements that interface.

member.name: F:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.InterfaceMethods
member.summary: Shows the methods that are defined on the interface.

member.name: F:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.InterfaceType
member.summary: Shows the type that represents the interface.

member.name: F:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.TargetMethods
member.summary: Shows the methods that implement the interface.

member.name: F:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.TargetType
member.summary: Represents the type that was used to create the interface mapping.

member.name: T:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions
member.summary: Provides methods that retrieve information about types at run time.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetMethodInfo(System.Delegate)
member.summary: Gets an object that represents the method represented by the specified delegate.
member.returns: An object that represents the method.
member.param: The delegate to examine.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeBaseDefinition(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents the specified method on the direct or indirect base class where the method was first declared.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified method's initial declaration on a base class.
member.param: The method to retrieve information about.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeEvent(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents the specified event.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified event, or null if the event is not found.
member.param: The type that contains the event.
The name of the event.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeEvents(System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection that represents all the events defined on a specified type.
member.returns: A collection of events for the specified type.
member.param: The type that contains the events.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeField(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents a specified field.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified field, or null if the field is not found.
member.param: The type that contains the field.
The name of the field.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeFields(System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection that represents all the fields defined on a specified type.
member.returns: A collection of fields for the specified type.
member.param: The type that contains the fields.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeInterfaceMap(System.Reflection.TypeInfo,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns an interface mapping for the specified type and the specified interface.
member.returns: An object that represents the interface mapping for the specified interface and type.
member.param: The type to retrieve a mapping for.
The interface to retrieve a mapping for.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeMethod(System.Type,System.String,System.Type[])
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents a specified method.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified method, or null if the method is not found.
member.param: The type that contains the method.
The name of the method.
An array that contains the method's parameters.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeMethods(System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection that represents all methods defined on a specified type.
member.returns: A collection of methods for the specified type.
member.param: The type that contains the methods.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection that represents all the properties defined on a specified type.
member.returns: A collection of properties for the specified type.
member.param: The type that contains the properties.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.RuntimeReflectionExtensions.GetRuntimeProperty(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents a specified property.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified property, or null if the property is not found.
member.param: The type that contains the property.
The name of the property.
